reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: HIV/AIDS Response for Key Populations and Community TB Programme in High Burden Areas in Liberia

description.narrative: Liberia - TB/HIV - Plan International, Inc. - Plan International Liberia. This program has the following goals: An AIDS-free Liberia, with Zero new infection, Zero AIDS-related death and Zero AIDS-related stigma and discrimination. End TB in Liberia by 2035. The objectives of this program are: By 2025 Reduce New HIV infections to less than 190 per year. Reduce stigma and discrimination for PLHIV and vulnerable populations to less than 20%. Strengthen and promote leadership, coordination and accountability for the National Response at central and decentralized levels. Strengthen monitoring, reporting and evaluation of the national AIDS response from all sectors. Mobilize adequate resources to achieve the goals and objectives of the NSP. Provide high-quality TB diagnosis and treatment to all patients without their having to incur catastrophic costs. Institute bold policies and supportive systems for TB care and prevention. Intensify research and innovations for TB
